title: Finding Points to Graph
text: Find three points whose coordinates are solutions to the equation. Organize them in a table.

title: Plotting Points
text: Plot the points in a rectangular coordinate system. Check that the points line up. If they do not, carefully check your work.

title: Graphing the Line
text: Draw the line through the three points. Extend the line to fill the grid and put arrows on both ends of the line.
